name: Joanne Williams
what_you_do: Joanne Williams's mission as a 30-year mental health professional is to teach practical skills to reduce anxiety in her courses, certifying to use a Psychiatric service dog [ESApros.com] and her 1–1 counseling sessions focused on understanding WHY they have anxiety to move to WHAT to do in specific situations.
who_you_serve: Clients who want to have their dog assist them to fly without panicking.
social_proof: 30-year mental health professional, licensed mental health professional
signature_programs: Boost your Confidence 6 week Course, Anxiety Simplified Going Beyond Psychology podcast
business_focus: Helping people overcome anxiety through practical skills, counseling, and psychiatric service dogs.
service_provided: Anxiety reduction courses, psychiatric service dog certification, 1-on-1 counseling
